snippet: Pfizer Inc won the dismissal Tuesday of a long-running shareholder class action accusing the company of misleading investors about the safety of its Celebrex and Bextra pain-relieving drugs....

headline.print_headline: Pfizer Wins Dismissal of U.S. Investor Class Action Ahead of Trial
headline.main: Pfizer Wins Dismissal of U.S. Investor Class Action Ahead of Trial

lead_paragraph: Pfizer Inc won the dismissal Tuesday of a long-running shareholder class action accusing the company of misleading investors about the safety of its Celebrex and Bextra pain-relieving drugs.
